plot: A short film based off the popular video game series 'Gears of War.' The story follows a single soldier, Aestoni, as she has been separated from the rest of her platoon.
title: Gears of War: Mercy's End
plot_es: A short film based off the popular video game series 'Gears of War.' The story follows a single soldier, Aestoni, as she has been separated from the rest of her platoon.
